newsitem.title: JAPAN: Honda May domestic output up 29.5 pct y/y.
newsitem.headline: Honda May domestic output up 29.5 pct y/y.

text.p: Honda Motor Co Ltd said on Friday that its domestic vehicle production, exports, domestic sales and overseas output in May were as follows (with percentage comparisons from a year earlier):
Honda's production was up for the 11th consecutive month on a year-on-year basis, the company said in a statement.
Domestic sales fell in May partly due to a rise in Japan's national sales tax on April 1 to five percent from three percent, it said.
Exports in May rose for the ninth month in a row, reflecting brisk sales of Honda's CR-V light sport-utility vehicle in North America and Europe, the company said.
It added that overseas production rose for the 16th consecutive month, in response to strong sales in North America.
